thread.title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
thread.title_full: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium

title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
text:
> Sports Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium New York Mets' Curtis Granderson, left, Michael Cuddyer, center, David Wright, right, await their turn at batting practice during a workout at Citi Field for NLDS series against the Los Angeles Dodgers, Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015, in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Kmonicek) Search Help
